JavaDoq: Edge.java   
01 package de.general.graph;
02 
03 
04 import java.util.*;
05 
06 
07 /**
08  *
09  * @author knauth
10  */
11 public class Edge
12 {
13 
14     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15     // Constants
16     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
17 
18     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
19     // Variables
20     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
21 
22     private final Graph graph;
23     private Node fromNode;
24     private Node toNode;
25     private int id;
26 
27     private HashMap<String, Object> assocs;
28 
29     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
30     // Constructors
31     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
32 
33     /**
34      * Constructor.
35      */
36     protected Edge(Graph graph, int id, Node fromNode, Node toNode)
37     {
38         this.id = id;
39         this.graph = graph;
40         this.fromNode = fromNode;
41         this.toNode = toNode;
42     }
43 
44     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
45     // Methods
46     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
47 
48     public HashMap<String, Object> associations()
49     {
50         if (assocs == null) assocs = new HashMap<String, Object>();
51         return assocs;
52     }
53 
54     public int getID()
55     {
56         return id;
57     }
58 
59     public Node getNodeFrom()
60     {
61         return fromNode;
62     }
63 
64     public Node getNodeTo()
65     {
66         return toNode;
67     }
68 
69     public Graph getGraph()
70     {
71         return graph;
72     }
73 
74     public void remove()
75     {
76         if (fromNode == null) return;
77 
78         fromNode.edgesTo.remove(this);
79         toNode.edgesFrom.remove(this);
80 
81         fromNode = null;
82         toNode = null;
83         id = -1;
84     }
85 
86     @Override
87     public String toString()
88     {
89         if (id < 0) {
90             return "Edge[(null)]";
91         } else {
92             return "Edge[" + fromNode.getName() + " -> " + toNode.getName() + "]";
93         }
94     }
95 
96 }
  JavaDoq: Edge.java
